sentences.en: a cold rainy day in October
sentences.cn: 十月里一个寒冷的雨天

sentences.en: He laid up some money for a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 他积蓄一些钱以备不时之需.

sentences.en: How do you amuse yourself in rainy weather?
I'll put the rest in the bank for a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 我要把余款存入银行以备不时之需。

sentences.en: putting money by for a rainy day.
Rainy weather and fog prohibited flying.
sentences.cn: 多雨的天气和雾妨碍了飞行.

sentences.en: Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.cn: 雨天会给枯草热患者带来欣喜，减轻他们的痛苦。

sentences.en: She usually goes to work by bike except on rainy days.
sentences.cn: 除了雨天之外,她总是骑自行车上班.

sentences.en: Soon the rainy season sets in.
The camp supplies dampened during the long rainy season.
sentences.cn: 营地的补给品在漫长的雨季里受潮了.

sentences.en: The overcast and rainy weather found out his arthritis.
sentences.cn: 阴雨天使他的关节炎发作了.

sentences.en: The rainy season in the Andes normally starts in December.
sentences.cn: 安第斯山区的雨季通常在12月份来临。

sentences.en: The weather won't clear up until the rainy season is over.
sentences.cn: 雨季不结束天不会放晴.

sentences.en: Umbrella and raincoats are what people need in rainy days.
sentences.cn: 伞和雨衣都是下雨天人们要用的.

sentences.en: We happened to arrive there in the rainy season.
We may expect muggy weather when the rainy season begins.
sentences.cn: 雨季开始时,我们预料有闷热的天气.

sentences.en: We should save money against a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 人们要存一些钱,以备不时之用.

phrases.tran_cn: 可能有困难（尤指缺钱）的未来日子

trans.tran_en: a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot
a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot
